title: Survivor Saijaku no Ore wa Hazure skill “Faker” de Tenshina Kanojo to S rank wo Mezasu - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Game Elements   Hiding True Abilities   Jack of All Trades   Level System   Living Alone   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   R-15   Special Abilities   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: 海翔
description:
Yamaoki Rin is a 16 years old first-year high school student.

In this world where strange-looking monsters have started to appear, he participates in the monster subjugations as a survivor who possesses supernatural powers.

Rin’s skill is [Faker], a rare skill that can imitate the skills of other survivors. But its fatal flaw is skills imitated by [Faker] are dramatically weaker in comparison to the original abilities.

One day, Rin became aware of the true power of his failure skill [Faker] in a battle against a goblin.

This is a story about Rin, the lowest rank survivor, who awakens to his abilities and becomes stronger by defeating monsters with his cute partner.>
